name: ReadyMajorRun
description:
WIP. Jump and collect money to some synthwave by Evan King. https://www.evankingmusic.com

Controls:

  • Space to jump
  • Down arrow to slide
  • M to pick next song, N for previous
  • ESC will return you to main menu

Updates

  • Update 1 (Web): Added Tutorial Sequence, Slide, and moar Coins!
  • Downloadable: Wall Jump and Reverse run!
